Key Match Events: Najmul Hossain Shanto scored a career-best 71 runs.
Mustafizur Rahman had an effective performance with 2 wickets for 15 runs from his four overs.
Taskin Ahmed was at his best, contributing to the bowling attack.
Bangladesh defended a target of 151 runs against Zimbabwe.
Post-Match Reflections: Shanto expressed that it was a special knock for him, having scored his first T20I fifty.
Shanto mentioned that he had the full backing of the team management, captain, and senior players.
Shanto emphasized the need to convert good starts into bigger scores in future games.
Shanto reflected on the belief in their bowlers to defend the total despite feeling they were 15-20 runs short.
Shanto highlighted the importance of the win in galvanizing the team ahead of upcoming challenges against India and Pakistan.
